resources.string: Pierce the egg and add to boiling water
Do you like this app? Please star it on GitHub.

Place the phone at a position with GPS reception and wait until your altitude is shown.

Enter size of the egg. The egg sizes are as defined in the EU. 

Enter temperature of the egg.

Select desired consistency. 

Pierce the egg and put into boiling water. The egg must be fully covered with water! 

Press the START button. 

For more information please visit the project on GitHub.
